Generation VII.Sun: It leaps at its prey with a courageous shout. Its scaly punches tear its opponents to shreds.
Generation VII.Moon: It sheds and regrows its scales on a continuous basis. The scales become harder and sharper each time they're regrown.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It makes noise by clanging its scales together. When the rhythm has reached its peak, Hakamo-o attacks.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: The scales it sheds can be molded and processed to make pots and pans. They conduct heat well, so they're a popular item.

Generation VIII.Sword: The scaleless, scarred parts of its body are signs of its strength. It shows them off to defeated opponents.
Generation VIII.Shield: Before attacking its enemies, it clashes its scales together and roars. Its sharp claws shred the opposition.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It gets into fistfights so intense that the scales on its arms peel off. Bare arms are a sign of valiance.
Generation IX.Violet: It fires itself up by striking its scales with force as it dances. Its roar is a battle cry.

Generation VIII.Sword: Lake of Outrage Axew's Eye , Rolling Fields ( Max Raid Battle )
